review: I've enjoyed using this device a great deal for YouTube, Netflix, HBO Go and other services. The only Issue I have with it is that its output doesn't seem to jive well with my older Epson projector. All other devices display fine (blu-ray player and cable DVR), but the ChromeCast display is "zoomed in" with the edges omitted. My projector doesn't have an overscan setting that lets me correct it.

review: I wish Google made everything...This little guy came in the mail, and i thought, well let's see how this works.I unpacked it, and plugged it in. Setup was a breeze and I was watching Netflix in less than 10 minutes (including the software update).It is well made, durable, and ULTRA PORTABLE, especially when compared to its competition (e.g. Apple TV, Roku). I throw it in my briefcase when on the road and plug it into my hotel room TV. So nice. Control via smartphone is so logical and easy.For $35, you can't go wrong. ~20,000 other reviews can't be wrong!
